nodes.text: Bohhuah Mutdah was an individual who craved immense riches. According to a tale told by the Mustafarian Tuttel, after a Twi'lek girl who was led by Emperor Palpatine into retrieving the Gem of the Luminous from an ancient temple was attacked by droids designed to ward off intruders, she claimed that being rich beyond Mutdah's dreams was not worth the effort to acquire the artifact.

Bohhuah Mutdah was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in a flashback sequence of the comic Star Wars Adventures: Shadow of Vader's Castle, written by Cavan Scott and published by IDW Publishing on November 4, 2020. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Bohhuah Mutdah originated in the 1983 novel Lando Calrissian and the Flamewind of Oseon, written by L. Neil Smith.
